name: claim_rewards
attributes: # [doc = " ステークアカウントの報酬を請求し、トークンを転送する"]
body: let stake_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . stake_account ;
let current_time = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
let reward_amount = (elapsed as u64) . checked_mul (ctx . accounts . config . reward_rate) . unwrap () ;
stake_acc . rewards = stake_acc . rewards . checked_add (reward_amount) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . reward_vault . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_token_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: stake_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] で所有者チェックを入れるべき"]

fields.name: reward_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬支払い用のトークン保管アカウント（Vault）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_token_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの受け取り用トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI 実行権限を持つサービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL トークンプログラム"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬レート等を保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このアカウントを所有するユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ステーキング対象の NFT ミントアドレス"]

fields.name: staked_at
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 前回請求時刻（UNIX タイムスタンプ）"]

fields.name: reward_rate
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬レート（トークン単位／秒）"]
